reporter_caption.center: NELSON v. FELTON PEARSON COMPANY, INC., 198 Ga. App. 532 (1991)

caption.center: NELSON et al. v. FELTON PEARSON COMPANY, INC. et al.

opinion.opinion_text:
This court having entered a judgment in the above-styled case at 195 Ga. App. 92 (392 S.E.2d 274) (1990) vacating the judgment of the trial court, and the judgment of this court having been reversed on certiorari by the Supreme Court in Felton PearsonCo. v. Nelson, 260 Ga. 513 (397 S.E.2d 431) (1990), the judgment heretofore rendered by this court is vacated, and the judgment of the Supreme Court is made the judgment of this court. The judgment of the trial court is affirmed.
Judgment affirmed. Banke, P. J., and Birdsong, P. J.,concur.
opinion.posture: Workers' compensation. Fulton Superior Court. Before Judge Johnson.
opinion.attorneys:
Savell Williams, John M. Williams, Richard G. Farnsworth, for appellants.
Bovis, Kyle Burch, D. Scott McPherson, Steven J. Kyle,Terry L. Yewell, Christina A. Craddock, Charles M. McDaniel,Jr., for appellees.Page 533
